trans-unit.source: The base exception type for all COM interop exceptions and structured exception handling (SEH) exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 所有 COM interop 例外狀況和結構化例外狀況處理 (SEH) 例外狀況的基底例外狀況類型。

trans-unit.source: To enhance interoperability between legacy systems and the common language runtime, the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A> property stores an integer value (HRESULT) that identifies the error.
trans-unit.target: 若要增強傳統系統與 common language runtime 之間的互通性<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>屬性會儲存識別錯誤的整數值 (HRESULT)。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: User defined exceptions should never derive from `ExternalException`, and an `ExternalException` should never be thrown by user code.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的例外狀況應該永遠不會衍生自`ExternalException`，和`ExternalException`絕不會擲回由使用者程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the specific exceptions that derive from `ExternalException` instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定的例外狀況衍生自`ExternalException`改為。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the HRESULT E_FAIL which has the value 0x80004005.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`會使用 HRESULT E_FAIL 0x80004005 的值。

trans-unit.source: `ExternalException` uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: `ExternalException`使用預設的<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial values for an instance of `ExternalException`, see the `ExternalException` constructors.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的起始值的清單`ExternalException`，請參閱`ExternalException`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 所指定例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class from serialization data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>從序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref> class with a specified error message and the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ExternalException" name="ExternalException" href=""></xref>類別具有指定的錯誤訊息和錯誤的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of `ExternalException`.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值`ExternalException`。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>|The HRESULT of the error.| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>|錯誤的 HRESULT。 | |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|Null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException.ErrorCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that specifies the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 所指定例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref>的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: See [Common HRESULT values](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx) for a list of the more frequently encountered error codes.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[常見的 HRESULT 值](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa378137.aspx)一份越經常時發生的錯誤代碼。

trans-unit.source: `HRESULT` values are defined in the Winerror.h header file.
trans-unit.target: `HRESULT`Winerror.h 標頭檔中定義的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""></xref> of the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_HRESULT" name="HRESULT" href=""> </xref>的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the HRESULT of the error.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含錯誤的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the HRESULT.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示的 HRESULT。
